defaultError: **Unknown Error:** I'm sorry, I'm afraid I can't do that. This incident has been logged to the dashboard.

config.description: Configures Winnie_Bot to meet your needs.

crossGuild.description: Controls whether your challenges are visible to other servers.

get.description: Displays whether your challenges are visible to other servers.
get.disabled: Your challenges **will not** display on other servers.
get.enabled: Your challenges **will** display on other servers.

reset.description: Resets whether your challenges are visible to other servers.
reset.error: **Unknown Error**: Your challenge display preference cannot be reset (database validation error).
reset.success: Your challenge display preference has been reset.  Challenges **will** display on other servers.

set.description: Sets whether your challenges are visible to other servers.
set.disabled: Your challenges **will not** display on other servers.
set.enabled: Your challenges **will** display on other servers.
set.error: **Unknown Error**: Your challenge display preference cannot be set (database validation error).

args.enabled: A boolean value for cross-server visibility (true for visible, false for hidden).

timezone.description: Sets, erases, or displays your timezone.

error.notSet: You have not set a timezone yet. Use `/config timezone set` to set one.

reset.success: You have successfully reset your timezone.

set.success: You have successfully set your timezone to {{timezone}}.

error.invalidValue: **Error:** Winnie_Bot only accepts IANA timezone identifiers. These generally take the format of `Continent/Your_Areas_Largest_City` -- for example, `America/New_York`, `Australia/Sydney`, `Europe/London`, or `Asia/Tokyo`.

goal.description: Sets, updates, and resets your goals.

cancel.success: Your current goal has been cancelled.

error.couldNotCancelGoal: **Unknown Error**: Could not cancel goal (database validation error).
error.noActiveGoal: **Error**: You do not have an active goal.

info.description: Reminds you of your current goal.

error.noActiveGoal: **Error**: You do not have an active goal.

overwrite.description: Replaces the progress on your goal with a new value.

args.progress: Your progress towards your total goal.

error.couldNotOverwriteGoal: **Unknown Error**: Could not update goal (database validation error).
error.noActiveGoal: **Error**: You have not yet set a goal. Use `/goal set` to set one.
error.overwriteMustNoBeNegative: **Error**: Your total progress towards your goal cannot be a negative number.

reset.description: Changes your current goal. Progress remains the same if the goal is of the same type.
reset.success:
You have successfully reset your goal. 

{{goal}}

args.target: The total you plan to achieve.

error.couldNotResetGoal: **Unknown Error**: Could not reset goal (database validation error).
error.timezoneNotSet: **Error**: You have not set a timezone. Use `/config timezone set` to set one.

set.success:
You have successfully set your goal. 

{{goal}}

args.target: The total you plan to achieve.

error.couldNotCreateGoal: **Unknown Error**: Could not create goal (database validation error).
error.goalAlreadyActive: **Error**: You have already set a goal of this type. Use `/goal reset` to change it.
error.timezoneNotSet: **Error**: You have not set a timezone. Use `/config timezone set` to set one.

args.progress: The amount to add to your current total.

error.couldNotUpdateGoal: **Unknown Error**: Could not update goal (database validation error).
error.noActiveGoal: **Error**: You have not yet set a goal. Use `/goal set` to set one.
error.totalMustBePositive: **Error**: Your total progress towards your goal cannot be a negative number.

server.description: Configures Winnie_Bot to meet your server's needs. Requires Manage Server permissions.

announcementsChannel.description: Chooses the channel which Winnie_Bot makes announcements to.

get.success: Winnie_Bot will currently post announcements to <#{{announcementsChannel}}>.

reset.error: **Unknown Error**: Could not reset announcements channel (database validation error).
reset.success: You have successfully reset the announcements channel.

set.success: Winnie_Bot will now post announcements to <#{{announcementsChannel}}>.

args.announcementsChannel: The channel that Winnie_Bot will post announcements to.

set.error: **Unknown Error**: Could not set announcements channel (database validation error).

crossGuild.description: Controls whether your server's challenges are visible to other servers.

get.description: Displays whether your server's challenges are visible to other servers.
get.disabled: Your server's challenges **will not** display on other servers.
get.enabled: Your server's challenges **will** display on other servers.

reset.description: Resets whether your server's challenges are visible to other servers.
reset.error: **Unknown Error**: Your server's challenge display preference cannot be reset (database validation error).
reset.success: Your server's challenge display preference has been reset.  Challenges **will** display on other servers.

set.description: Sets whether your server's challenges are visible to other servers.
set.disabled: Your server's challenges **will not** display on other servers.
set.enabled: Your server's challenges **will** display on other servers.
set.error: **Unknown Error**: Your server's challenge display preference cannot be set (database validation error).

args.enabled: A boolean value for cross-server visibility (true for visible, false for hidden).

locale.description: Configures the language that Winnie_Bot uses in your server.

reset.description: Resets Winnie_Bot's current language to English.
reset.error: **Unknown Error**: Winnie doesn't know how to speak that language.  Parlez vous Latin? (database validation error)
reset.success: You have reset Winnie_Bot's current language to English.

set.description: Sets a new language for Winnie_Bot to speak.
set.error: **Error**: The locale that you are trying to set does not exist (database validation error).

timezone.description: Sets, erases, or displays your server's timezone.

get.description: Displays your server's currently set timezone.

error.notSet: You have not set a server timezone yet. Use `/server timezone set` to set one.

reset.description: Erases your server's currently set timezone.
reset.success: You have successfully reset your server's timezone.

set.description: Sets or resets your server's timezone.
set.success: You have successfully set your server's timezone to {{timezone}}.

error.invalidValue: **Error:** Winnie_Bot only accepts IANA timezone identifiers. These generally take the format of `Continent/Your_Areas_Largest_City` -- for example, `America/New_York`, `Australia/Sydney`, `Europe/London`, or `Asia/Tokyo`.

challenge.description: Challenge yourself! Race to a certain number of words, or war for words in a given time.

args.id: The ID of the challenge that you want to cancel.

error.couldNotCancelChallenge: **Unknown Error**: Could not cancel challenge {{ id }} (database validation error).
error.userIsNotOwner: **Error**: Only the creator of {{ challengeName }} (ID {{ id }}) can cancel the challenge.

finish.description: Sets your finish time for a race.
finish.success: You completed {{ challengeName }} (ID {{ id }}) in {{ completionTime }} minutes.

args.id: The ID of the race that you just finished.

error.challengeHasNotStarted: **Error**: Challenge {{ id }} has not started yet!
error.challengeIsNotRace: You can only set finish times for races.  Use `/challenge total` to set your total for a war.
error.challengeTooOld: **Error**: Challenge {{ id }} finished too long ago!
error.couldNotFinishChallenge: **Unknown Error**: Could not finish race {{ id }} (database validation error).
error.noChallengeSpecified: **Error**: I don't know which race to finish!  Use `/challenge finish` with an ID number to finish a specific race.

args.id: The ID of the challenge that you want to join.

error.challengeAlreadyJoined: **Error**: You have already joined challenge {{ id }}, and cannot join another.
error.couldNotJoinChallenge: **Unknown Error**: Could not join challenge {{ id }} (database validation error).

leave.description: Leaves the challenge that you have joined.
leave.success: You have left {{ challengeName }} ( ID {{ id }}).

error.couldNotLeaveChallenge: **Unknown Error**: Could not leave challenge {{ id }} (database validation error).
error.noActiveChallenge: **Error**: You haven't joined a challenge yet.

error.couldNotListChallenges: **Unknown Error**: Could not list challenges (database validation error).

args.delay: The time to wait before starting the first war in minutes. Defaults to 5.
args.duration: The duration of each war in the chain in minutes. Defaults to 10.
args.join: A boolean value. true to join the chain, false to not. Defaults to false.
args.length: The number of wars in the chain.
args.name: The name of the chain.  Defaults to `$USER`'s chain war.
args.split: The time between wars in the chain in minutes. Defaults to 5.

error.couldNotStartChain: **Unknown Error**: Could not start a new chain (database validation error).

args.delay: The time to wait before starting the race in minutes. Defaults to 5.
args.duration: The time that the race will be listed in minutes. Defaults to 30.
args.join: A boolean value. true to join the race, false to not. Defaults to false.
args.name: The name of the race.  Defaults to `$USER`'s race.
args.target: The total that you want to race to.

error.couldNotStartRace: **Unknown Error**: Could not start a new race (database validation error).

args.delay: The time to wait before starting the war in minutes. Defaults to 5.
args.duration: The duration of the war in minutes. Defaults to 10.
args.join: A boolean value. true to join the war, false to not. Defaults to false.
args.name: The name of the war.  Defaults to `$USER`'s war.

error.couldNotStartWar: **Unknown Error**: Could not start a new war (database validation error).

error.challengeNameHasMentions: **Error**: Challenge names cannot contain Discord objects (users, roles, channels, etc).
error.challengeNameTooLong: **Error**: Challenge names must be 150 characters or less.

status.description: Displays the current status of a challenge.

args.id: The ID of the challenge that you want to see the status of.

error.couldNotGetStatus: **Unknown Error**: Could not get status of challenge {{ id }} (database validation error).

summary.description: Prints the summary of a challenge.

args.id: The ID of the challenge that you want the summary for.

error.challengeNotStarted: **Error**: Challenge {{ id }} has not started yet!
error.couldNotPrintSummary: **Unknown Error**: Could not print summary for challenge {{ id }} (database validation error).

total.description: Adds your total for a war or chain war.

args.id: The ID of the war that you want to post a total for.
args.total: The number of words that you wrote (or things that you did) during the war.

error.challengeHasNotStarted: **Error**: Challenge {{ id }} has not started yet!
error.challengeIsRace: **Error**: You cannot add a total to a race.  Use `/challenge finish` to complete a race.
error.challengeTooOld: **Error**: Challenge {{ id }} finished too long ago!
error.couldNotAddTotal: **Unknown Error**: Could not add a total for war {{ id }} (database validation error).
error.noChallengeSpecified: **Error**: I don't know which war this total is for!  Use `/challenge total` with an ID number to post a total for a specific war.
**Error**: I don't know which challenge to find!
